name: adviceRight
description: Whether the advisor endorsed the right side

name: adviceSide
description: Whether the advisor endorsed the left (0) or right (1) side. Basic value is overwritten by the R script and the raw value is stored as adviceSideOld because early version of the JavaScript code reported this incorrectly

name: adviceSideOld
description: Archive of raw advisor endorsed-side variable from JavaScript

name: adviceString
description: Text displayed to the participant indicating the side which was endorsed by the advisor

name: adviceType
description: The advisor’s agreement profile

name: advisor[0-9]+adviceSide
description: Which of the binary options is endorsed by the Nth advisor.

name: advisor[0-9]+adviceString
description: The text of the advice given by advisor N.

name: advisor[0-9]+agrees
description: Whether advisor N agrees with the participant.

name: advisor[0-9]+group
description: Id of the group to which advisor N belongs

name: advisor[0-9]+id
description: The id of advisor N

name: advisor[0-9]+influence
description: The influence of advisor N

name: advisor[0-9]+influenceRaw
description: The raw influence of advisor N.

name: advisor[0-9]+type
description: Advice type offered by advisor N

name: advisorAgrees
description: Whether the advisor agrees with the participant. Basic value is overwritten by the R script and the raw value is stored as advisorAgreesOld because early versions of the JavaScript code reported this incorrectly

name: advisorAgreesOld
description: Archive of raw advisor agreement variable from JavaScript

name: advisorGroup
description: Id of the group to which the advisor belongs

name: advisorId
description: The advisorId of the advisor giving advice on the trial

name: advisorInfluence
description: Influence of the advisor

name: advisorInfluenceRaw
description: Raw influence of the advisor

name: block
description: Block number (includes sub-blocks and practice blocks, so 2nd block 1st sub-block is block number 4 if there is one practice block and two sub-blocks per block)

name: choice0
description: The advisorId of the advisor in the choice slot at the top of the screen

name: choice1
description: The advisorId of the advisor in the choice slot at the bottom of the screen

name: confidenceCategory
description:
The category into which the participant’s confidence falls. This is calculated each trial by taking the participant’s confidence ratings so far and determining whether the current value falls into the
0.	bottom 30%
1.	middle 40%
2.	top 30%

name: confidenceShift
description: The amount the participant’s confidence increased in their final response

name: confidenceShiftRaw
description: The amount the participant’s confidence increased in their final response, capped by the magnitude of the largest possible positive increase

name: correctAnswer
description:
The box containing the most dots
0.	left
1.	right

name: defaultAdvisor
description: The default advisor offered for trials where participants have a default advisor and an option to switch to another.

name: dotDifference
description: The number of dots added to the more populated box and subtracted from the less populated box. The objective task difficulty

name: durationAdviceDuration
description: Duration of the advice phase (ms)

name: durationAdvisorChoice
description: Duration of the advisor choice phase (ms)

name: feedback
description: Whether the participant received feedback on their response

name: finalAnswer
description:
The participant’s final answer to which box contains the most dots
0.	left
1.	right

name: finalConfidence
description: The participant’s rating of their confidence in their final response [0-50]

name: finalConfSpan
description: The participant’s final confidence coded on a [-50,50] scale where leftwards answers are [-50,-1] and rightward answers are [1,50]

name: finalCorrect
description: Whether the participant’s final response was correct

name: grid
description: Hash of the specific dot task grid displayed to the participant

name: hasChoice
description: Whether the trial offers a choice of advisor

name: id
description: Trial number (sequential)

name: influence
description: The amount the participant’s confidence changed towards the direction endorsed by the advisor

name: initialAnswer
description:
The participant’s initial answer to which box contains the most dots
0.	left
1.	right

name: initialConfidence
description: The participant’s rating of their confidence in their first response [0-50]

name: initialConfSpan
description: The participant’s initial confidence coded on a [-50,50] scale where leftwards answers are [-50,-1] and rightward answers are [1,50]

name: initialCorrect
description: Whether the participant’s initial response was correct

name: irrational
description: Whether the influence on a trial is negative

name: isRepeat
description: Whether this trial's stimulus is a repeat of a previous stimulus

name: isRepeated
description: Whether a future trial reuses this trial's stimulus

name: participantId
description: The identification code for the participant. Where the participant comes from Prolific this is the sha1 hash of their Prolific ID. Where they do not, this is the sha1 hash of their starting timestamp plus a random decimal portion

name: pid
description: A shorthand integer used for identifying a particular participant

name: practice
description: Whether the trial is a practice trial

name: rawInfluence
description: The amount the participant’s confidence changed towards the direction endorsed by the advisor using confidenceShiftRaw

name: repeatRejection
description: Reason this trial's stimulus was disqualified from being repeated.

name: stimulusParent
description: Id of the trial which originally used this trial's stimulus (isRepeat trials only)

name: switch
description: Whether the participant changed their response side in their final answer

name: timeFinalFixation
description: Timestamp of the fixation cross appearance for the final response phase

name: timeFinalResponse
description: Timestamp of the final response

name: timeFinalStart
description: Timestamp of the beginning of the final response phase

name: timeFinalStimOff
description: Timestamp of the stimulus offset for the final response phase

name: timeFinalStimOn
description: Timestamp of the stimulus onset for the final response phase

name: timeInitialFixation
description: Timestamp of the fixation cross appearance for the initial response phase

name: timeInitialResponse
description: Timestamp of the initial response

name: timeInitialStart
description: Timestamp of the beginning of the initial response phase

name: timeInitialStimOff
description: Timestamp of the stimulus offset for the initial response phase

name: timeInitialStimOn
description: Timestamp of the stimulus onset for the initial response phase

name: type
description: Whether the trial offers a choice of advisor (choice) or not (force), or no advisor (catch)

name: typeName
description: Name of the trial type

name: warnings
description: Newline-separated strings of any warnings about the trial reported by JavaScript (e.g. that the difficulty has reached its maximum level)
